title: How to install ARIES 4" Oval Side Bars on a Ford F-150 Super Crew
description: See the tools you'll need for installation and a thorough run-down of the mounting process for ARIES 4" Oval Side Bars (part #S223043).
tags: Aries, Nerf Bar Installation, Side Steps, running boards, Ford, F150

asset.title: ARIES Side Bar Installation: 4" Ovals S223043 on Ford F-150 Super Crew
asset.description:
This video demonstrates the installation of the ARIES S223043 4" Oval Side Bars on a 2015 Ford F-150 Super Crew.  These side bars are available in a black powder coat or 304 stainless steel finish.

Features Include:
Blended end caps
Custom raised step pads
No-drill application

Vehicle Coverage:
2015 Ford F-150 Super Crew

Part #
S223043 (Black Powder Coat Finish)
S223043-2 (Stainless Steel Finish)
asset.author: ARIES Automotive
